settings.heading: DESCRIPTION
settings.row_content:
Great for everyday personal and home hygiene with the trusted protection and care of Dettol. Specially formulated to meet a wide range of uses, and gives you and your family the trusted Dettol protection everyday.

MORE INFORMATION
- Strong enough for use in hospitals
- Boad pectrum Antimicrobial
- Hand Disinfectant
- Kills 99.9% Germs
- Recommended by Integrated Medical Association

settings.heading: USAGE INFORMATION
settings.row_content:
- Pump thumbnail size amount in your palm
- Briskly rub hands together until dry

settings.heading: FAQs
settings.row_content:
Q: Why is Hand Hygiene important?A: The incidence of germ transference is higher from hands to mouth thereby causing illnesses like diarrhoea, swine flu, cold & cough etc. Ensuring proper hand hygiene habits for your family can act as the first line of defence in protection from various illnesses.

Q: Where can I use Dettol Hand Rub?A: Dettol Hand Rub kills 99.9% of germs instantly, without water. Use anytime, anywhere: while in car, Hospitals, office, handbag, picnics, nappy change, travel, sports etc. Leaves your hands refreshed. Use as often as required.

Q: Why should I use Dettol Hand Rub?Â A: Dettol Hand rub is a rinse-free, non-sticky formula to kill 99.9% germs without water. Simply apply a few drops of the antiseptic on your hand and rub them.

Q: How should I use the product?A: Take small amount in your palm then briskly rub hands together until dry. Store below 30 degrees C
